function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in emissions leading to improved air quality","Impact":"Reduced risk of respiratory diseases such as asthma, bronchitis, and other lung diseases","Mitigation":"Maintaining lower emissions to sustain improved air quality","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technologies","People":"General public, especially those susceptible to respiratory diseases","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of lockdown on pollution levels in major cities","Impact":"Reduction in pollution levels leading to improved visibility and reduced health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable measures to reduce emissions post-lockdown","Technologies":"Clean energy technologies, public transportation enhancements","People":"Residents of major cities, urban populations","Owner":"Local government, city planners"},{"Description":"Temporary reduction in CO2 and NO2 emissions due to lockdown","Impact":"Temporary improvement in air quality and reduced risk of respiratory and heart-related diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of long-term sustainable energy and transportation policies","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, carbon capture and storage technologies","People":"Global population, especially individuals affected by air pollution","Owner":"International organizations, policymakers"}]}
